name: Sorry, we're closed
description:
A cute, litte Point-and-Click Adventure about the last week of earth.

God is closing the earth since more and more people are turning their back on religion and start loosing their faith. You have 7 days (7 Minutes) to improve your faith score and get selected into heaven. If you fail you will end up dying, sorry!

Who made this?

  • Programming
    • Jann Lüllmann Portfolio
    • Lyzzerd Artstation
  • Art
    • Fulutu YouTube
    • Pessi Artstation
